trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACH_00393_HOUDIN_000_000<tab>Welcome to Rhalgr's Reach. I shall answer any questions you have to the best of my ability.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACH_00393_HOUDIN_000_001<tab>If it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, hero of the revolution! I shall answer any questions you have to the best of my ability.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACH_00393_HOUDIN_000_010<tab>I am Houdin, a loyal member of the Resistance fighting against the Empire.

TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACH_00393_HOUDIN_000_011<tab>It is a hard fight, but nothing compared to what my defenseless countrymen are currently dealing with. We shall not rest until the day we taste victory!
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACH_00393_HOUDIN_000_020<tab>I am Houdin, a loyal member of the Resistance that fought to free Ala Mhigo from the Empire.

TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACH_00393_HOUDIN_000_021<tab>We could not have done it without the help of Eorzea, Doma, and you of course, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Now the fight is over I plan to dedicate myself to helping my homeland get back on its feet.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACH_00393_HOUDIN_000_030<tab>Rhalgr's Reach is our base of operations. We are protected by the watchful gaze of the Temple of the Fist.

TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACH_00393_HOUDIN_000_031<tab>It was set ablaze long ago by the mad king Theodoric, the majority of the monks there massacred. The ruins now serve as a place of refuge for those who need it.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACH_00393_HOUDIN_000_040<tab>Rhalgr's Reach is our base of operations. We are protected by the watchful gaze of the Temple of the Fist.

TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACH_00393_HOUDIN_000_041<tab>It was set ablaze long ago by the mad king Theodoric, the majority of the monks there massacred. The ruins served as a place of refuge for those who needed it.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACH_00393_HOUDIN_000_042<tab>However, now Ala Mhigo has been liberated, the temple has been transformed into another base of ours.
